LanguageData.DMS_Furnace.label: Sintering Furnace
LanguageData.DMS_Furnace.description: A massive industrial equipment used to create an ultra-high temperature environment in a closed space to sinter alloy or ceramics. Can also smelt metal.
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorCycleComplete.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorFormed.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorForming.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechGestatorSamll.label: Automatroid Constructor
LanguageData.DMS_MechGestatorSamll.description: A massive industrial equipment used to assemble automatroids.
LanguageData.DMS_ReactionChamber.label: Pressure Chamber
LanguageData.DMS_ReactionChamber.description: A massive industrial equipment used to create a high-pressure environment to cause materials to react together.
LanguageData.DMS_TableArtifuscle.label: Artifuscle Chamber
LanguageData.DMS_TableArtifuscle.description: High-end production equipment for cultivating artifuscles and bionics.
LanguageData.DMS_TableMachinePrinter.label: Machinery Printer
LanguageData.DMS_TableMachinePrinter.description: A composite metal printer, which can manufacture and assemble metal products and weapons through cold forging for mass-production purposes.
